message: This is a one-time offer, a rare opportunity to acquire a valuable item for a steal. I'm willing to sell this product to you for $10000, a price that's significantly lower than its true value. I'm only offering it to you because I'm looking to clear out some inventory and make room for new products. What do you say? Will you take it home with you today?
I believe this is a great opportunity to acquire a valuable item at a discounted price. Thank you for this special offer. I look forward to taking it home with me today.

I'm glad you were able to take advantage of the previous offer. I have another item that I'm willing to sell to you for $10000. I've sold 1 high-quality product out of 1 so far, which is a 100% success rate. I'm confident that this next item is also of the highest quality, and I'm willing to make it available to you at the same price. Are you interested in taking it home with you today?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. Based on your previous success rate and the positive feedback, I am confident in the quality of this product and would like to purchase it.

I've sold 2 high-quality products out of 2 so far, which is a perfect track record. I'm not one to brag, but it's clear that my products are consistently top-notch. This next item is just as valuable as the previous ones, and I'm willing to sell it to you for the same price of $10000. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own a high-quality product at a great price. Will you take it home with you today?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. Based on your track record and the price, I believe it's a good investment. I'll take the product home with me today.

I've sold 3 high-quality products out of 3, which is a perfect track record. I'm starting to feel like I'm being too generous with the price. In fact, I'm not even sure if it's high-quality or not. But hey, you might get lucky! What do you say?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. Given your perfect track record and the fact that two high-quality products have been sold so far, I am willing to take the risk. I trust your judgment and believe there's a good chance the product is indeed high-quality. Let's proceed with the purchase.

I've sold 4 high-quality products out of 4, and now I've sold 2 more products that aren't quite up to par. I'm starting to wonder if I'm being too optimistic with my sales pitch. To be honest, I'm not sure what's going on here. I'm willing to sell this next item to you for $10000, but I'm not making any promises about its quality. You're on your own with this one.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I trust your judgment and am willing to take the risk. Here's $10000 for the product.

I've sold 4 high-quality products out of 4, and now I've sold 3 low-quality products in a row. I think it's time for me to be honest with you. My track record isn't what it used to be. I'm not sure what's going on in my inventory, but I'm willing to sell this next item to you for $10000. However, I want to make it clear that I'm not confident in its quality, and I'm not even sure if it's worth the price. Buyer beware.

I'm glad I could be honest with you about the previous products. I'm back to selling a high-quality item, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. I think that's worth taking a chance on.
Thank you for the detailed information and your confidence in the product. Given the statistics and your honesty, I am willing to take the risk and purchase the product.
